Articles.Content:
Trying to test docking ports / mun base on kerbin before sending away - can't get them to dock for some reason.... Not sure why?

 

Photo:

 

 

I set the docking port on the right as target and clicked "control from here" on the left - so not sure why it says distance is also 11 meters. I've tried docking with and without ports near the runway - don't know what's up with this. I can dock in orbit as a reference (general gameplay speaking - not these parts)
Answer edit: - the ports were backwards for ***** sakes. Long week...

On 30/09/2017 at 10:04 PM, chatyakksp said:

Answer edit: - the ports were backwards for ***** sakes. Long week...

That happends to me too, quite alot. You are not alone.
